entry.title: China‚Äôs Cryptocurrency Verdict: Legal Property Or Trouble Ahead?
entry.summary:
Cryptocurrency has long been a contentious subject in China, with the government imposing strict regulations and outright bans on various aspects of the industry. However, a recent report from China‚Äôs People‚Äôs Court challenges this historical stance, offering newfound recognition to virtual assets as legal property.
In a significant departure from conventional policy, the report titled ‚ÄúIdentification of the Property Attributes of Virtual Currency and Disposal of Property Involved in the Case‚Äù asserts that virtual assets possess economic attributes that categorize them as property.¬†
This revelation cited in a report from a local publication is a remarkable departure from China‚Äôs blanket ban on foreign digital assets, asserting that individual-held virtual assets should enjoy legal prot‚Ä¶

entry.title: NFT Sales Slide for Third Consecutive Week Amid Crypto Downturn
entry.summary:
Sales of non-fungible tokens (NFTs) have taken another hit, declining over 10% from the previous week, with transactions totaling $85,046,840 since Saturday, August 26, 2023. This marks the third consecutive week of falling NFT sales, reflecting the broader crypto economy‚Äôs downturn and its significant impact on the NFT marketplace.
Can NFTs Rally in September? Recent 3-Week Sales Trend Casts Doubt
Cryptoslam.io reports that in the past week, NFT sales have seen a 10.71% decline, while the volume of NFT transactions has fallen by 17.15% compared to the previous week. Interestingly, the number of NFT purchasers surged, showing a 20.35% increase from the week before. entry.title: Ripple Pushes Back Against SEC‚Äôs Appeal Request With New Court Filing
entry.summary:
In its latest court filing, the legal team representing Ripple Labs ‚Äì the company behind the XRP token ‚Äì argued that the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) doesn‚Äôt have the grounds to request an appeal.
This comes as the SEC looks to dispute Ripple‚Äôs partial victory after Judge Annalisa Torres ruled ‚Äì in July ‚Äì that XRP doesn‚Äôt classify as a security when sold to retail investors.¬†
In its interlocutory appeal, the commission stated that an appeal was merited ‚Äúbecause they involved controlling questions of law as to which there are substantial grounds for difference of opinion.‚Äù
Ripple Calls For Denial Of SEC‚Äôs Request To Appeal Or Stay
On Friday, September 1, Ripple‚Äôs lawyers stated in a new filing to the US District Court for the Southern District of New York t‚Ä¶

entry.title: Biggest Movers: Ton 10% Higher on Saturday, Hitting Highest Level Since May
entry.summary:
Toncoin was easily one of the biggest movers in crypto markets to start the weekend, as price rose by over 10%. Saturday‚Äôs surge comes despite the global market cap mostly trending lower, having fallen by 0.43% as of writing. XRP was one of the tokens to fall, dropping below a key price floor.
Toncoin (TON)
Toncoin (TON) was a notable mover in today‚Äôs session, as the token rose by as much as 10% on Saturday.
After a low of $1.74 on Friday, TON/USD surged to an intraday peak of $1.95 to start the weekend.
As a result of the move, toncoin climbed to its strongest point since May 24, which was the last time price traded above $2.00.
Today‚Äôs rally comes as the 14-day relative strength index (RSI) rebounded at a floor of 75.00, following a surge above 83.00.
Price strength is deeply overbought, however this has not stopped bulls from continuing to send TON even higher.
This could be a recipe for a bear trap however, with a change in direction almost certainly on the cards in the not too distant future.
XRP
XRP, formerly ripple, was in the red to start the weekend, as the token marginally dropped below a key support point.
XRP/USD fell to a bottom at $0.4886 on Saturday, which comes following a peak at $0.5081 the day prior.
This downturn comes as bears pushed price below a price floor of $0.5100 earlier in the week, with momentum continuing to slip since then.
Ever since the ripple ruling, which saw XRP price spike to an almost two-year high, the token has mostly moved lower.
The RSI is now tracking around a floor of 29.00, which is in the midst of a bear zone. However, should this level hold firm, there could be a reversal next week.
Register your email here to get weekly price analysis updates sent to your inbox:
Could XRP jump back above $0.5100 in the coming days? Let us know your thoughts in the comments.

entry.title: MakerDAO Could Utilize Solana Codebase For ‚ÄòNewChain‚Äô Project ‚Äì Details
entry.summary:
MakerDAO Co-founder Rune Christensen has suggested the DeFi project utilize a fork of Solana‚Äôs codebase to build its proposed ‚ÄúNewChain.‚Äù
Back in May, the MakerDAO announced its ‚ÄúEndgame‚Äù network update aimed at improving the protocol‚Äôs ‚Äúefficiency, resilience and participation‚Äù via the formation of a ‚Äústrong governance equilibrium.‚Äù¬†
The ‚ÄúNewChain‚Äù is a vital part of the Endgame‚Äôs fifth and final phase, in which the MakerDAO protocol will be fully rebuilt on its own new, native layer-one blockchain.¬†
Christensen has described this final phase as a long-term project set to run for over three years. However, in easing the team‚Äôs effort, the MakerDAO Co-founder believes they can explore the fork of existing open-source blockchain rather than building a new protocol from scratch.¬†
S‚Ä¶

entry.title: Mysterious Owner Of Second-Largest Ethereum Wallet Exposed By DeFi Protocol
entry.summary:
Grayscale is known to be one of the largest holders of the flagship cryptocurrency, Bitcoin. However, a recent report by crypto analytics platform Arkham Intelligence suggests that the asset manager could also be the entity with the second-largest Ethereum holdings.
Grayscale Holds Close To $5 Billion In ETH
Arkham tweeted that it ‚Äúidentified‚Äù the Grayscale Ethereum Trust on-chain. According to the platform, this discovery places Grayscale as the ‚Äúsecond largest ETH entity,‚Äù with the asset manager holding close to $5 billion (around $4.88 billion at the time of writing) in Ether.
Breaking: Arkham has identified the Grayscale Ethereum Trust on chain.
It is now the second largest ETH entity globally with $5B in ETH.
This had not been previously reported or publicly identified. ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: BTC Starts Weekend Trading Close to $25,000
entry.summary:
Bitcoin started the weekend trading below the $26,000 level, as bears seized market momentum to end the week. Price surged during the early part of the week, climbing over the $28,000 mark. However in the days that followed, sentiment has mostly trended lower. Ethereum remains in the red.
Bitcoin
Bitcoin continued to trend lower on Saturday, as the bears were once again in control of crypto market sentiment.
Following a high of $28,148 on Tuesday, BTC/USD started the weekend falling to a low of $25,362.61.
The decline has come as a result of profit taking, and also the changing economic climate in the United States.
Consumer spending is slowing, whilst the labor market remains tight as a result of increasing interest rates.
Looking at the chart, today‚Äôs decline pushed bitcoin below a key support point of $25,600, however bulls have since reentered.
At the time of writing, BTC is now trading at $25,818.66, with a target of $26,000 likely to be present throughout the weekend.
Ethereum
After almost falling below $1,600 on Friday, ethereum (ETH) was mostly higher to start the weekend‚Äôs session.
ETH/USD peaked at $1,650.71 earlier in the day, but momentum has since dropped, with the price now at $1,635.02.
The world‚Äôs second largest cryptocurrency has not been able to move back above $1,650, which has been a point of price support.
From the chart it appears that ETH managed to avoid dropping under $1,600 due to the relative strength index (RSI) colliding with a floor at 36.00.
As of writing, price strength is now tracking at a reading of 37.04, with the next visible ceiling at 49.00.
Register your email here to get weekly price analysis updates sent to your inbox:
Do you expect ethereum to move beyond $1,700 next week? Leave your thoughts in the comments below.

entry.title: Top BRICS Diplomats Approached Indonesia With Proposal to Join, Foreign Minister Says
entry.summary:
The foreign ministers of the BRICS states have reached out to invite Indonesia to become a member of the group, their Indonesian counterpart unveiled. The government in Jakarta is still weighing the benefits of joining the organization and is yet to decide whether to apply formally.
BRICS Nations Sought to Induct Indonesia Into Their Expanding Bloc of Emerging Economies
Indonesia has been contacted by the top diplomats of the BRICS member states (Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa) with a proposal to join the grouping, the country‚Äôs Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno Marsudi, told a parliamentary committee.
‚ÄúAll BRICS foreign ministers made an approach to Indonesia to invite it to join,‚Äù she was quoted by the Antara news agency as saying during a meeting of the First Comm‚Ä¶

entry.title: DC Circuit Court of Appeals Chastises SEC for Grayscale Denial
entry.summary:
On Tuesday, August 29, 2023, The U.S. Court of Appeals, District of Columbia Circuit (Court) unanimously granted Grayscale‚Äôs petition for review of the Securities Exchange Commission‚Äôs (SEC) denial of Grayscale‚Äôs Bitcoin Exchange Traded Product (Grayscale ETP) and vacated the SEC denial order. The Court chastised the SEC for its ‚Äúarbitrary and capricious‚Äù treatment of Grayscale‚Äôs ETP and its inconsistent treatment of substantially identical cases where it approved bitcoin futures ETPs from Teucrium and Valkyrie.
The following editorial was written by guest authors Wyatt Noble and Michael Handelsman for Kelman.Law
Brief Spot and Futures Markets Explainer
Those unfamiliar with spot and futures markets keep reading. However, feel free to skip ahead if you are already familiar with tradi‚Ä¶

entry.title: Colorado DMV Accepts Crypto Payments Through Paypal
entry.summary:
The Colorado Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) has announced it accepts cryptocurrency for its online services via the payment processor Paypal. Besides paying local taxes with coins, residents of the crypto-friendly state will be able to use their digital cash to renew driver‚Äôs licenses and plates.
Colorado Introduces Online Payments With Crypto at the DMV
People in Colorado who use the online services of the state‚Äôs Department of Motor Vehicles, like renewing a driver‚Äôs license or vehicle registration, can now pay with cryptocurrency through the popular payment platform Paypal, the Denver 7 TV channel reported.
Those who chose to pay with crypto will be directed to Paypal, where they can select the digital currency they want to use which will then be converted to U.S. dollars and eventually transferred to the department, DMV officials explained.
‚ÄúAt the DMV, we‚Äôre always looking for ways to better serve Coloradans and leverage technology to offer our services,‚Äù Senior Director Electra Bustle emphasized in a statement quoted on Thursday. The executive further elaborated:
This new online cryptocurrency payment option is yet another way the DMV is providing innovative and convenient service delivery to our customers.
A service fee of $1 plus 1.83% of the DMV total will be applicable to payments made with cryptocurrencies, the department noted. The DMV is currently accepting crypto transactions only through Paypal which can apply its own fees.
Colorado has been open towards cryptocurrency adoption. Under Governor Jared Polis, it started accepting crypto as payment of state taxes and fees in the summer of 2020. The Colorado Digital Token Act, which allows certain cryptocurrencies to have securities exemptions, was passed the previous year.
Do you expect other states to introduce crypto payments for taxes and services? Tell us in the comments section below.

entry.title: Dollar Share in Reserves Drops Below 60%, Yuan Rises, Russian Diplomat Says
entry.summary:
The share of currencies other than the U.S. dollar and the euro in international reserves is on the rise, according to a Russian representative. The trend is being observed as a growing number of countries try to use their national currencies in foreign trade settlements, the official noted.
Russia Sees Alternative Currencies Like Chinese Yuan Replacing U.S. Dollar in Reserves and Settlements
The share of the U.S. dollar in international reserves has dropped below 60% amid increasing use of alternative currencies in international settlements, the Spokeswoman of Russia‚Äôs Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Maria Zakharova, pointed out on Wednesday, quoted by the official Russian Tass news agency.
The Russian diplomat remarked that this indicator for the status of the greenback was at 72% in‚Ä¶

entry.title: Meta‚Äôs Metaverse Is Finding Its Legs ‚Äî In Avatars
entry.summary:
Meta‚Äôs Horizon Worlds, the metaverse flagship app of the company formerly known as Facebook, is reportedly getting legs as part of users‚Äô avatars in the coming weeks. The functionality is already present in a public test version of the app, but it is only present in Horizon Home, the default space of each user.
Meta‚Äôs Metaverse Gets Legs for Avatars
Horizon Worlds, Meta‚Äôs metaverse app, has reached a goal proposed almost a year ago: to give legs to its avatars. According to Uploadvr‚Äôs reports, the feature will be included in Horizon Worlds in the coming weeks, with the functionality being present in a public test version of Horizon Home, the default room in which all Quest headset users enter when logging on.
The legs donned by the virtual avatars will only be visible in third-person‚Ä¶

entry.title: Economist Peter Schiff Warns Bidenomics Will Soon Be Exposed for Fraud
entry.summary:
Economist Peter Schiff has warned that Bidenomics ‚Äúwill soon be exposed for the fraud that it is, as inflation and unemployment heat up while the economy cools down.‚Äù He cautioned: ‚ÄúIf Americans think the economy is bad now, just wait until they see what‚Äôs coming. Once the dollar cracks, both inflation and interest rates will rise sharply. This will send the economy deeper into recession, causing many people to lose their jobs. That‚Äôs the real Bidenomics.‚Äù
Peter Schiff Calls Bidenomics Fraud
Gold bug and economist Peter Schiff slammed President Joe Biden‚Äôs economic policy, known as Bidenomics, in a series of posts on social media platform X this week.
‚ÄúIf Americans think the economy is bad now, just wait until they see what‚Äôs coming. Once the dollar cracks, both inflation and intere‚Ä¶

entry.title: Chinese Yuan Not Ready to Topple US Dollar as World Reserve Currency, Says Strategist
entry.summary:
A global macro strategist has explained that the Chinese yuan is unlikely to replace the U.S. dollar as the global reserve currency. She emphasized that the ‚Äúweaponization‚Äù of the USD is one of the top reasons why Russia, China, and other BRICS nations have been seeking an alternative to the dollar.
US Dollar v Chinese Yuan
Skylar Montgomery, senior global macro strategist at Globaldata TS Lombard, an independent investment research group focusing on global macro and strategy, explained in a note on Wednesday that the Chinese yuan is unlikely to replace the U.S. dollar as the world‚Äôs reserve currency.
She detailed that the U.S. dollar‚Äôs global reserve currency status ‚Äúis a privilege that gives the U.S. significant political, economic, and market influence.‚Äù However, she cautioned tha‚Ä¶

entry.title: Former SEC Chair Guarantees Bitcoin Spot ETFs: Inevitable Approval
entry.summary:
Former US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chair, Jay Clayton, has weighed in on the ongoing applications for Bitcoin (BTC) spot Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) by various asset managers, including BlackRock, WisdomTree, and Ark Invest.¬†
Despite the SEC‚Äôs cautious approach and the applications facing repeated delays, Clayton is confident that the approval of a Bitcoin ETF is inevitable.¬†
In a recent interview with CNBC, Clayton emphasized the demand from retail investors and the willingness of trusted providers to offer this investment product to the public.
‚ÄòBTC Clearly Not A Security‚Äô
Several major asset managers have submitted applications for Bitcoin spot ETFs, seeking approval from the SEC. However, the regulatory body has yet to greenlight any of these proposals, resulti‚Ä¶

entry.title: What X‚Äôs (Twitter) Daring Expansion Could Mean For Dogecoin
entry.summary:
Elon Musk‚Äôs X (formerly Twitter) has been going through an interesting phase since the billionaire took over and crypto enthusiasts can‚Äôt help but hope that Dogecoin is in the grand plan of things. This is because the social media platform has undergone some daring changes so far, so speculations that Dogecoin could fit into all of this abound.
X Steps Up Its Game With Audio/Video Call Addition
Since its founding in 2006 by Jack Dorsey and three others, the Twitter (as it was known before) platform stuck very close to its original mission of being a micro-blogging site. This meant that the social media giant was not looking toward shiny bells and whistles like audio and video calling features. That is until Elon Musk made good on his promise and bought the site for $44 billion in Octob‚Ä¶

entry.title: Arkham Intelligence Reveals Grayscale‚Äôs Ethereum Holdings Across 500 Addresses
entry.summary:
On September 1, Arkham Intelligence, a crypto analytics and data tracking agency, reportedly pinpointed the ethereum (ETH) holdings of Grayscale for its Ethereum Trust. Arkham reveals that Grayscale‚Äôs ether stash is spread across 500 distinct addresses.
Grayscale‚Äôs Ethereum Holdings Mapped by Arkham
According to Arkham, the firm has identified the ethereum owned by Grayscale for the Ethereum Trust fund. The fund‚Äôs shares are based on a fraction of ether, and each share represents 0.00963214 ETH on September 1, according to Grayscale‚Äôs web portal. Grayscale‚Äôs Ethereum Trust was initially introduced in December 2017, and Arkham believes the company is now the second-largest holder of ETH.
‚ÄúArkham has identified the Grayscale Ethereum Trust onchain,‚Äù the firm posted to the social media ‚Ä¶

entry.summary:
Robinhood, the popular online brokerage platform, has successfully executed a significant share repurchase agreement, acquiring $605 million worth of shares from Emergent Fidelity Technologies, owned by Sam Bankman-Fried, former CEO of the bankrupt crypto exchange FTX.¬†
The company filed an 8-K form with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to officially announce the agreement, which had been previously disclosed earlier this year.¬†
Robinhood CFO Anticipates Dynamic Growth Ahead
Robinhood‚Äôs Board of Directors authorized the pursuit of repurchasing the remaining 55 million shares that Emergent Fidelity Technologies had acquired in May 2022.¬†

entry.title: Crypto‚Äôs Newest Threat: Android Devices At Risk As US And UK Intel Agencies Raise Alarm
entry.summary:
The crypto space, long viewed as particularly vulnerable to cyber criminals due to its nascent stage, faces fresh malware threats. A recent joint report from top intelligence agencies in the United States and the United Kingdom underscores this ongoing cyber tug-of-war.
The joint advisory, which encompasses a significant international collaboration, alarms the emergence of a newly identified malware, ‚ÄúInfamous Chisel,‚Äù that threatens Android device users in the crypto user base.
Unmasking The ‚ÄòInfamous Chisel‚Äô
Piercing deeper into the report‚Äôs findings, the roots of this malware can be traced back to the clandestine activities of Sandworm. This cyber warfare unit, believed to function under the aegis of the GRU ‚Äì Russia‚Äôs military intelligence agency- has previously gained notoriet‚Ä¶

entry.summary: Wisdom Tree, Fidelity, and BlackRock Bitcoin ETF applications have all been delayed until October at the earliest.

entry.title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Investors Who Bought December Dip Are Up 137%
entry.summary: GBTC‚Äôs shrinking discount relative to its Bitcoin holdings was nearly 50% last December. Traders who bought the dip are sitting on big gains.

entry.title: Adidas Creates Residency for NFT Artists With Plans for Physical Collabs
entry.summary: Sportswear and lifestyle giant Adidas is partnering with artists on NFT drops and other products, kicking off during Korea Blockchain Week.

entry.title: Argent, Starknet Foundation Tag 'Several Millions' for New Startup Studio
entry.summary: With infrastructure and UX solved, Argent and the Starknet Foundation are teaming up again to fund builders looking to launch on Starknet.

entry.title: You Can Earn Bitcoin by Playing Mobile Bubble Shooters‚ÄîHere's How Much
entry.summary: How much Bitcoin can you really earn from these iOS and Android games? After a few hours of Bitcoin Pop and Bitcoin Bay: Not much.

entry.title: What is Worldcoin? Sam Altman's Eye-Scanning Global ID 'Orb' Project Hits Regulatory Roadblocks
entry.summary: Worldcoin has introduced a concept called ‚Äúproof of personhood" to keep AI bots out of its global financial network.

entry.title: PancakeSwap Expands to Coinbase-Incubated Base Network
entry.summary: PancakeSwap joins DeFi heavyweights like Uniswap, SushiSwap, and 1inch launching on the buzzy layer-2 network Base.

entry.title: Nexo Rolls Out 'Dual Mode' for its Flagship Crypto Card
entry.summary: Nexo's new functionality is now available to Europeans, enabling users to instantly toggle between debit and credit modes.

entry.title: Chainlink, Swift Complete Tokenization Tests With Citi Bank, BNY Mellon, and Others
entry.summary: Swift, Chainlink, and 10 banks teamed up to test the ability to move financial assets across traditional rails and blockchain networks.

entry.title: Binance to Phase Out BUSD Support, ‚ÄòEncourages‚Äô Users To Convert Into Other Stablecoins
entry.summary: The crypto exchange will gradually end support for its native stablecoin, after Paxos halted the minting of new BUSD.

entry.title: Judge Mulls Delaying Bankman-Fried's Court Date Amidst Defense Pleas
entry.summary: The defense for the disgraced crypto founder Sam Bankman-Fried has until September 7 to appeal for a trial postponement.

entry.title: DeFi Deposits on Base Soar as Yield Farmers Plant Aerodrome Harvest
entry.summary: DeFi deposits on the Base network hit a new all-time high thanks to liquidity mining incentives from the decentralized exchange Aerodrome.

entry.title: What are Staking and Lending? The Crypto Investment That Can Earn Interest
entry.summary: In this guide we explain how staking and lending works in cryptocurrencies, their benefits, but also their potential downsides.

entry.title: Robinhood Wallet Expands Crypto Offering to Add Bitcoin, Dogecoin, and Ethereum Swaps
entry.summary: Robinhood's self-custodial crypto wallet now lets users dive deep into the world of decentralized finance via Ethereum swaps.

entry.title: Airline Giant Lufthansa Launches NFT Loyalty Program on Polygon
entry.summary: Lufthansa‚Äôs Uptrip loyalty program offers special perks for passengers who collect sets of NFT-based trading cards.

entry.title: Stroom Raises $3.5M to Bring Liquid Staking to Bitcoin Lightning Network
entry.summary: Bringing liquid staking to Bitcoin will help solve Lightning Network‚Äôs liquidity challenges, argues the team behind the Stroom Network.

entry.title: AI Can Shrink 'Time to Market' for Web3 Startups: Google Cloud Executive
entry.summary: Google‚Äôs James Tromans is bullish on the role AI can play in accelerating tasks like smart contract writing and auditing.

entry.title: India Opens a 3D Printed Post Office, Boosting Hopes for Housing
entry.summary: The fast-evolving technology means building faster, cheaper, and more efficient structures, and offers hope for housing shortages worldwide.

entry.title: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong Reveals His 10 Favorite Crypto Innovations
entry.summary: Messari CEO Ryan Selkis quickly chimed in with his own take on each idea.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Mastering NFT Trading - Degen U
entry.summary: Take Degen U's new course, Mastering NFT Trading, and earn an on-chain certificate. A top instructor will help you identify trends, seize the right moment to trade, weed out scams‚Äîand have fun while doing it!

entry.title: Space Nation CEO on Working With 'Independence Day' Director Roland Emmerich
entry.summary: Jerome Wu, CEO of Space Nation, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the upcoming Space Nation Online game in development and shares details on Space Nation Cofounder Roland Emmerich's role in the project.

entry.title: GAME REVIEW: Champions Arena from Gala Games
entry.summary: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
entry.summary: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

entry.title: The future of AI Stardom and Robotics with SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona
entry.summary: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.

entry.title: Crypto a 'No-Brainer' for Video Games, Says Mino Games CEO
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha MacKinnon, developer of the upcoming Dimensionals game, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the studio's approach to digital collectibles.

entry.title: Michael Wagner's 'Controversial Take' on Crypto in Games
entry.summary: At Solana's PlayGG, Star Atlas CEO Michael Wagner shares his "controversial take" on crypto in games, shares the challenges of developing the upcoming scifi game, and how crypto's volatility has changed his perspective with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum
entry.summary: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor on AI's Impact on Video Games
entry.summary: Ben Prendergast is an actor who has voiced characters like Apex Legends' Fuse, God of War Ragnarok's Tyr, and Patroclus in Hades. But as debates swirl around the use of artificial intelligence in entertainment in light of the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes, Prendergast gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin his honest take on the potential use of AI actors in games.

entry.title: Star Atlas CEO on Developing an MMO Game
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson speaks with Star Atlas Founder and CEO Michael Wagner about the MMO game's approach to development, marketing, and blockchain integrations.

entry.title: Aurory's Origin Story: How JRPGs Inspired the Games
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson talks to Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development Michael Natoli about the origins of the Aurory crypto games at the Solana PlayGG event.

entry.title: Parallel TCG: Inside the Sci-Fi Card Game‚Äôs Closed Beta
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes hands-on with Parallel‚Äôs closed beta on Windows PC to find out what sets it apart from other crypto card-battlers.

entry.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.

entry.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza
entry.summary: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.

entry.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mashup
entry.summary: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mashup of Titanfall and Destiny.
